posts.content:
hiya
i am looking for ideas of curtain set up for my 23 window bus with a devon interior.i already have silent bliss around including the cab but would like some pics of how you have your set up with tie backs/with or without the bottom spring wire type of curtain guide fitted.
where are your tie backs/where are your curtains divided...i.e tailgate window split in to 2 pieces etc.
pics of buses with curtains would be a great help.
many thanks
rob

Tie back sits in centre of metal between each window.
One tie back sits at front of windows on B post right back to rear.
Rear hatch curtain is attached at bottom...rolled up and held with three straps...
It rolls up to poppers at the top.
Pictures in Peebles thread..
We spent ages looking at different options and in the end we have gone for magnets in the hems so that we don't need tie-backs and instead of curtains front and rear we have Bus Eyes covers.
